description:
Summary:

Use cannot edit Profile Picture in User Details fragment. Nothing happens when Edit Floating Action Button is pressed.

Steps to reproduce:

Open App -> Click on the profile pic -> Click on Edit Icon (nothing happens)

Expected behaviour:

The user should be able to change his profile picture.

Observed behaviour:

Nothing happens when clicked on edit icon

Device and Android version:

Android 10
OpenPlus 6
Stock Rom
name: Mifos Mobile - Bug Fix: User cannot edit Profile Picture
